title: India to be one of our biggest growth markets this decade: Airbnb CEO Brian Chesky
description: ​​In an exclusive interview with ET, CEO and cofounder Brian Chesky spoke about India being one of the biggest growth markets of this decade, the launch of Airbnb Rooms and sweeping new upgrades based on community feedback, global inflationary pressures and their impact on travel and bouncing back from the Covid-19 pandemic.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
